5.73. 
Right of first refusal of other heirs to buy the inherited farm
If an heir sells a farm inherited in accordance with Article 5.71 of this Code within ten years of the inheritance of the farm, the other heirs shall have the right of first refusal to purchase the farm if they have not been paid the full amount of compensation provided for in Article 5.71 of this Code. In the event of the sale of the farm, the other heirs shall have the right to demand immediate payment of the balance of the compensation.
